Package Controller

Class Tournament

java.lang.Object
Controller.Tournament
public class Tournament extends Object
The Tournament class represents a series of games played using a GameEngine. It manages the flow of multiple games, including setup, execution, and result reporting.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tournament

      public Tournament(GameEngine p_gameEngine, PhaseView p_phaseView, LogEntryBuffer p_logEntryBuffer, LogWriter p_logWriter)
      Constructor for the Tournament class.
      Parameters:
      p_gameEngine - The GameEngine instance to be used for the tournament.
      p_phaseView - The PhaseView instance to display game phases.
      p_logEntryBuffer - The LogEntryBuffer for logging game information.
      p_logWriter - The LogWriter for writing logs.
